bark.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: when a dog barks, it makes a short loud sound or series of sounds
bark.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The dog always barks at strangers.
bark.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to say something quickly in a loud voice
bark.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: ‘Don’t just stand there, give me a hand, ’ she barked at the shop assistant.
bark.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to rub the skin off your knee, elbow etc by falling or knocking against something
bark.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: I barked my shin against the step.
bark.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the sharp loud sound made by a dog
bark.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: the outer covering of a tree
bark.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: Amy’s voice was a hoarse bark.
